text: Hey guys! I’m Dan. I just added this to a different channel but realized this may be the best channel to put my request in? Not sure, and apologies if I’m in the wrong place. I’m working on developing a crm app for sales teams, and need to create some UI elements/extensions like a custom card to put on sales reps ‘contact’ page. I haven’t been able to create a sandbox in the cli with the right permissions to do this. Is there a way around this? I’m hoping to avoid having to upgrade to an enterprise level sales package to code this, is that possible?

Hello everyone,
I know quite of bit about HubSpot CMS. But I am new in serverless functions.
I have create a quote template where a deal has multiple contacts and companies associations.
What I am trying to do is to pull multiple associated companies in a quote.
But crm_associations() does not work. `<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/Quote-template-using-crm-associations-HubL-function/m-p/742916>`
Can we create a Serverless function and pull the associated companies, custom objects data into quote template.

Looking forward to get your suggestions and experience on this.

Hey everyone, has anyone come up with a way to handle webhook subscriptions in HubSpot when it sends too many webhooks? Specifically when your app makes a change in HubSpot and the update you made triggers another webhook?
